DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date on which a specimen block was sent to another organization (or its laboratory).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis. The specimen may, or may not be representative, whereas the selected sample has to be representative.  To be divided into smaller units, such as a small clinical trial being broken up into smaller groups to maintain balance. In addition, preserved specimens embedded in support material.(NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis. The specimen may, or may not be representative, whereas the selected sample has to be representative.

Concepts.definition: a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Property.preferredDefinition: To be divided into smaller units, such as a small clinical trial being broken up into smaller groups to maintain balance. In addition, preserved specimens embedded in support material.(NCI)

Concepts.definition: To be divided into smaller units, such as a small clinical trial being broken up into smaller groups to maintain balance. In addition, preserved specimens embedded in support material.(NCI)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for Lombardi Cancer Center breast carcinoma trial
